name: Pig Inu
description: What is Pig Inu(PIGINU)? Pig Inu is a meme cryptocurrency token built on Binance Smart Chain with its own Staking App and Swap. Holders of PIGINU are being rewarded with tokens on every transaction. Staking in PIGINU allows holders to "stake" their coins in a specific wallet to help keep the network secure and operational. In exchange for locking up their coins, coin holders receive rewards in the form of interest, which can be paid in PIGINU and other cryptocurrencies or tokens. Apart from Staking, Pig Inu has its own Swap, Big Pot and NFTs.
